Dec 29, 2016
it barely ended in the 1980s.
“Lynching” is not a buzz-word
Steffani Cameron
5817

It didn’t end in the 1980s. Even though the schools were officially closed, the continuation of uneven foster care and incarceration looks a lot like more of the same. Not to mention missing women. If you’re interested, the TRC executive summary is available in PDF, audio, and YouTube (honestly I “read” it while doing my morning routine). However, you’re right about Mr. Yakabuski. Also, ugh, his straw mans! He’s right about one thing, he’s been in the US for too long!
